notes.title: Pizza
notes.content: Should pineapples on pizza be a crime? I don't think so. Hawaiian pizzas are the best!

notes.title: Sushi
notes.content: You don't want to eat sushi from the lake, get it in the coast.

notes.title: Taco
notes.content: Taco trucks have the best tacos!

notes.title: Fried Chicken
notes.content: Choongman chicken is better than BBQ.

notes.title: Pasta
notes.content: Carbonara should be made with egg yolk, not cream
